solution_line_template: The total number of insects collected is {boys_collected_insects} insects + {girls_collected_insects} insects = <<{boys_collected_insects}+{girls_collected_insects}={total_insects_collected}>>{total_insects_collected} insects.

When the teacher divided the class into {number_of_groups} groups, each group got {total_insects_collected} insects / {number_of_groups} groups = <<{total_insects_collected}/{number_of_groups}={insects_per_group}>>{insects_per_group} insects/group
